rev.comment: /* Efficiency */ please expand. there is more than just IBM to this.

/* Etymology and usage of the term */

/* Who authorized the killings? */ ref tag
/* Concentration and Labor Camps (1933â1945) */ Ref tag.
/* Children and adult prisoners */ Rename to children (adult prisoners dealt with throughout), add a citation, remove material that is not specific to Children
Unprotected The Holocaust: unprotecting. Has been protected more than a month. Has no template
/* Children and adult prisoners */ Ref tag.
/* Legal proceedings against Nazi criminals */ sigh, okay. But this is going to stay. The procedings were against nazis, not the criminals among nazis, as they were are criminals'
Rex, stop being disruptive - this article is about the Holocaust and not about Nazism in general
"nazi" doesn't merely refer to the Germans between 1939-45 it refers to all adherents of nazism as an ideology.
the Nazi regime and its crimes. most notably the holocaust, ended in 1945 .. legal proceedings started after that against those that had committed crimes earlier
/* Legal proceedings against Nazis */ rm those not actually guilty of any crimes during the Nazi era
/* Legal proceedings against Nazis */ Filbinger was definitely not a Nazi
/* Rescuers */ clean up text of previous edit
/* Death toll */ the picture was elaphatine, it is now more demure, but still readable.
removed external link from See also section
Added a link to the OpenLearn unit on The Holocaust
/* Rescuers */ fix line break near ref
/* The Tragic Outcome */ getting rid of uneeded links, adding them to the seperate Sources article and cleanup
rv to last version by Dalbury (undo edits implying doubt about the Holocaust)
/* Etymology and usage of the term */
/* Victims */ 'Soviets' are not a Slavic group
/* Concentration and Labor Camps (1933â1945) */ removed repeted map
/* Victims */ Tightened text for improved readability and accuracy

/* Survivors welfare */ This is really a possessive plural noun, hence the apostrophe: "Welfare of Survivors".-Writtenright

request for review of proposed edit

/* Who was directly involved in the mass murder? */ Bulgaria, Hungary, Italy and Romania all entered the war as allies of Germany, Slovakia joined the Axis after it separated from the Czech lands
rv, Roma and Sinti are often called Gypsies, Gypsies are not another group in addition to Roma and Sinti

Bulgaria and the Netherlands has German-imposed authorities deport Jews rather than an organic collaborationist government. As such they should be seperate.
/* Who was directly involved in the mass murder? */ I see no reason to separate the Netherlands from Greece, Norway and Serbia
Serbia and Norway also had collaborationist governments that participated in the Holocaust.
RV edit by Dalbury - Greece had a quisling goverment (much like Norway, Greece was occupied and had a quisling gov't and an active anti-Nazi resistance; for now, Greece should be listed as is
/* Who was directly involved in the mass murder? */ Greece and Serbia were occupied after being militarily defeated, they belong with the Netherlands and Norway
